item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

in character files put your rights as 1= mod 2= admin 3= owner 4and up = hidden owner

like so [code]
[ACCOUNT]
character-username = graham
character-password = password

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2897
character-posy = 3511
character-rights = 3
character-ismember = 0
character-messages = 0
[/code]
